org.whispersystems.libsignal.state

Class SessionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whispersystems.libsignal.state.SessionRecord

  • public class SessionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    A SessionRecord encapsulates the state of an ongoing session.
